thread.title: BRIEF-CSG Systems Q4 Revenue Rose 5 Percent To $205.2 Million

title: BRIEF-CSG Systems Q4 Revenue Rose 5 Percent To $205.2 Million
text:
15 PM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-CSG Systems Q4 Revenue Rose 5 Percent To $205.2 Million Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Csg Systems International Inc: 
* CSG SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL REPORTS RECORD RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.62 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 5 PERCENT TO $205.2 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUES $795 - $815 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EPS $2.76 - $2.89 
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EPS $2.15 - $2.28 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
